product_name: Twin Six The ARTCRANK Bike Jersey - Men's
long_description: With bold graphics inspired by the idea of bringing together bikes and art, The ARTCRANK Bike Jersey from Twin Six will keep you cool and collected on training rides or race day. Super-soft polyester wicks away perspiration and dries quickly. Full-front hidden zipper makes on/off and venting a breeze. 3 back pockets stow energy snacks and gear. The ARTCRANK Bike Jersey from Twin Six is made in the U.S.A.
short_description: With bold graphics inspired by the idea of bringing together bikes and art, The ARTCRANK Bike Jersey from Twin Six will keep you cool and collected on training rides or race day.
